meanings.definition: The quality of being innovative or introducing new ideas or methods.
meanings.sent1: Her innovativenesses in the project impressed everyone on the team.
meanings.sent2: The company's success is attributed to its constant innovativenesses.
meanings.sent3: His quirky innovativenesses always bring a fresh perspective to our meetings.
meanings.sent4: The innovativenesses of the young entrepreneur shone brightly in the competitive market.
meanings.sent5: The school celebrated the students' innovativenesses with an award ceremony.

meanings.definition: The act or process of introducing new ideas or methods.
meanings.sent1: The innovativenesses of the research team led to groundbreaking discoveries.
meanings.sent2: Innovativenesses are crucial for staying ahead in the fast-paced industry.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show highlighted the hilarious innovativenesses of its writers.
meanings.sent4: Her innovativenesses were like a breath of fresh air in the stale office environment.
meanings.sent5: The innovativenesses of the chef transformed the traditional dish into a culinary masterpiece.
